title: NTB AMEX ‘Pump Fuel and Win’ campaign rewards with latest Samsung Galaxy Z
body_lines: Nations Trust Bank American Express has announced the winners of the ‘Pump Fuel and Win’ campaign held in partnership with Samsung. Lucky Cardmembers Kalinga Pradeep Wijesinghe and Rajapaksha Manjula walked away with the latest Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3 5G and Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3 5G smartphones respectively. From left: Samsung Deputy General Manager Priyantha Jayasinghe, Winner of Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3 5G Kalinga Pradeep Wijesinghe, NTB Senior Vice President – Cards and Consumer Assets Niluka Gunatilake and Chief Marketing Officer Sanjaya Senarath
